商圈会员积分服务授权查询

更新时间：2024.09.20

通过此API，商圈商户/服务商可自行查询用户的商圈会员积分服务授权状态。

  • 接口频率：150QPS

  • 前置条件：商圈商户/服务商已开通支付即积分产品功能

接口说明

支持商户：【普通商户】

请求方式：【GET】/v3/businesscircle/user-authorizations/{openid}

请求域名：【主域名】https://api.mch.weixin.qq.com 使用该域名将访问就近的接入点

　　　　　【备域名】https://api2.mch.weixin.qq.com 使用该域名将访问异地的接入点 ，指引点击查看

请求参数

Header  HTTP头参数

 Authorization 　必填　string

请参考签名认证生成认证信息

 Accept 　必填　string

请设置为application/json

path  路径参数

 openid 　必填   string(64)

【顾客OpenID】顾客授权时使用的小程序上的OpenID

query  查询参数

 appid 　必填   string(128)

【小程序AppID】顾客授权积分时使用的小程序的AppID

请求示例

curl
Java
Go

GET

1curl -X GET \
2  https://api.mch.weixin.qq.com/v3/businesscircle/user-authorizations/oWmnN4xxxxxxxxxxe92NHIGf1xd8?appid=wx1234567890abcdef \
3  -H "Authorization: WECHATPAY2-SHA256-RSA2048 mchid=\"1900000001\",..." \
4  -H "Accept: application/json"

44      UserAuthorization response = client.run(request);
45        // TODO: 请求成功，继续业务逻辑
46        System.out.println(response);
47    } catch (WXPayUtility.ApiException e) {

50    }

53  public UserAuthorization run(QueryUserAuthorizationRequest request) {
54    String uri = PATH;
55    uri = uri.replace("{openid}", WXPayUtility.urlEncode(request.openid));
56    Map<String, Object> args = new HashMap<>();
57    args.put("appid", request.appid);
58    String queryString = WXPayUtility.urlEncode(args);
59    if (!queryString.isEmpty()) {
60        uri = uri + "?" + queryString;
61    }
62
63    Request.Builder reqBuilder = new Request.Builder().url(HOST + uri);
64    reqBuilder.addHeader("Accept", "application/json");
65    reqBuilder.addHeader("Wechatpay-Serial", wechatPayPublicKeyId);
66    reqBuilder.addHeader("Authorization", WXPayUtility.buildAuthorization(mchid, certificateSerialNo, privateKey, METHOD, uri, null));
67    reqBuilder.method(METHOD, null);
68    Request httpRequest = reqBuilder.build();
69
70    // 发送HTTP请求
71    OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient.Builder().build();
72    try (Response httpResponse = client.newCall(httpRequest).execute()) {
73      String respBody = WXPayUtility.extractBody(httpResponse);
74      if (httpResponse.code() >= 200 && httpResponse.code() < 300) {
75        // 2XX 成功，验证应答签名
76        WXPayUtility.validateResponse(this.wechatPayPublicKeyId, this.wechatPayPublicKey,
77            httpResponse.headers(), respBody);
78
79        // 从HTTP应答报文构建返回数据
80        return WXPayUtility.fromJson(respBody, UserAuthorization.class);
81      } else {
82        throw new WXPayUtility.ApiException(httpResponse.code(), respBody, httpResponse.headers());
83      }
84    } catch (IOException e) {
85      throw new UncheckedIOException("Sending request to " + uri + " failed.", e);
86    }
87  }
88

93  private final PublicKey wechatPayPublicKey;

95  public QueryUserAuthorization(String mchid, String certificateSerialNo, String privateKeyFilePath, String wechatPayPublicKeyId, String wechatPayPublicKeyFilePath) {
96    this.mchid = mchid;
97    this.certificateSerialNo = certificateSerialNo;
98    this.privateKey = WXPayUtility.loadPrivateKeyFromPath(privateKeyFilePath);
99    this.wechatPayPublicKeyId = wechatPayPublicKeyId;
100    this.wechatPayPublicKey = WXPayUtility.loadPublicKeyFromPath(wechatPayPublicKeyFilePath);
101  }

12func main() {
13	// TODO: 请准备商户开发必要参数，参考：https://pay.weixin.qq.com/doc/v3/merchant/4013070756
14	config, err := wxpay_utility.CreateMchConfig(
15		"19xxxxxxxx",                 // 商户号，是由微信支付系统生成并分配给每个商户的唯一标识符，商户号获取方式参考 https://pay.weixin.qq.com/doc/v3/merchant/4013070756
16		"1DDE55AD98Exxxxxxxxxx",      // 商户API证书序列号，如何获取请参考 https://pay.weixin.qq.com/doc/v3/merchant/4013053053
17		"/path/to/apiclient_key.pem", // 商户API证书私钥文件路径，本地文件路径
18		"PUB_KEY_ID_xxxxxxxxxxxxx",   // 微信支付公钥ID，如何获取请参考 https://pay.weixin.qq.com/doc/v3/merchant/4013038816
19		"/path/to/wxp_pub.pem",       // 微信支付公钥文件路径，本地文件路径
20	)
21	if err != nil {
22		fmt.Println(err)
23		return
24	}
25

27		Appid:    wxpay_utility.String("wx1234567890abcdef"),

29	}
30
31	response, err := QueryUserAuthorization(config, request)
32	if err != nil {
33		fmt.Printf("请求失败: %+v\n", err)
34		// TODO: 请求失败，根据状态码执行不同的处理
35		return
36	}
37
38	// TODO: 请求成功，继续业务逻辑
39	fmt.Printf("请求成功: %+v\n", response)
40}
41
42func QueryUserAuthorization(config *wxpay_utility.MchConfig, request *QueryUserAuthorizationRequest) (response *UserAuthorization, err error) {
43	const (
44		host   = "https://api.mch.weixin.qq.com"
45		method = "GET"
46		path   = "/v3/businesscircle/user-authorizations/{openid}"
47	)
48
49	reqUrl, err := url.Parse(fmt.Sprintf("%s%s", host, path))
50	if err != nil {
51		return nil, err
52	}
53	reqUrl.Path = strings.Replace(reqUrl.Path, "{openid}", url.PathEscape(*request.Openid), -1)
54	query := reqUrl.Query()
55	if request.Appid != nil {
56		query.Add("appid", *request.Appid)
57	}
58	reqUrl.RawQuery = query.Encode()
59	httpRequest, err := http.NewRequest(method, reqUrl.String(), nil)
60	if err != nil {
61		return nil, err
62	}
63	httpRequest.Header.Set("Accept", "application/json")
64	httpRequest.Header.Set("Wechatpay-Serial", config.WechatPayPublicKeyId())
65	authorization, err := wxpay_utility.BuildAuthorization(config.MchId(), config.CertificateSerialNo(), config.PrivateKey(), method, reqUrl.RequestURI(), nil)
66	if err != nil {
67		return nil, err
68	}
69	httpRequest.Header.Set("Authorization", authorization)
70
71	client := &http.Client{}
72	httpResponse, err := client.Do(httpRequest)
73	if err != nil {
74		return nil, err
75	}
76	respBody, err := wxpay_utility.ExtractResponseBody(httpResponse)
77	if err != nil {
78		return nil, err
79	}
80	if httpResponse.StatusCode >= 200 && httpResponse.StatusCode < 300 {
81		// 2XX 成功，验证应答签名
82		err = wxpay_utility.ValidateResponse(
83			config.WechatPayPublicKeyId(),
84			config.WechatPayPublicKey(),
85			&httpResponse.Header,
86			respBody,
87		)
88		if err != nil {
89			return nil, err
90		}
91		response := &UserAuthorization{}
92		if err := json.Unmarshal(respBody, response); err != nil {
93			return nil, err
94		}
95
96		return response, nil
97	} else {
98		return nil, wxpay_utility.NewApiException(
99			httpResponse.StatusCode,
100			httpResponse.Header,
101			respBody,
102		)
103	}
104}
105

126type UserAuthorization struct {
127	Openid          *string         `json:"openid,omitempty"`
128	AuthorizeState  *AuthorizeState `json:"authorize_state,omitempty"`
129	AuthorizeTime   *string         `json:"authorize_time,omitempty"`
130	DeauthorizeTime *string         `json:"deauthorize_time,omitempty"`
131}
132
133type AuthorizeState string
134
135func (e AuthorizeState) Ptr() *AuthorizeState {
136	return &e
137}
138
139const (
140	AUTHORIZESTATE_UNAUTHORIZED AuthorizeState = "UNAUTHORIZED"
141	AUTHORIZESTATE_AUTHORIZED   AuthorizeState = "AUTHORIZED"
142	AUTHORIZESTATE_DEAUTHORIZED AuthorizeState = "DEAUTHORIZED"
143)

应答参数

200 OK

 openid 　必填   string(64)

【顾客OpenID】顾客授权时使用的小程序上的OpenID

 authorize_state 　必填   string

【授权状态】顾客授权商圈积分结果，1."UNAUTHORIZED":未授权 ，2."AUTHORIZED":已授权 ，3."DEAUTHORIZED":已取消授权

可选取值：

  • UNAUTHORIZED: 顾客无授权商圈进行支付即积分的记录

  • AUTHORIZED: 顾客已授权商圈进行支付即积分的能力

  • DEAUTHORIZED: 顾客已取消授权商圈进行支付即积分的能力

 authorize_time 　选填   string(32)

【授权时间】顾客成功授权商圈积分的时间

 deauthorize_time 　选填   string(32)

【取消授权时间】顾客关闭授权商圈积分的时间

应答示例

200 OK

1{
2  "openid" : "oWmnN4xxxxxxxxxxe92NHIGf1xd8",
3  "authorize_state" : "UNAUTHORIZED",
4  "authorize_time" : "2020-05-20T13:29:35+08:00",
5  "deauthorize_time" : "2020-05-20T13:29:35+08:00"
6}
